import React, { useState } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' function ProjectForm({ postProject, history }) { const [state, setstate] = useState({ projectName: '', startDate: '', targetEndDate: '', }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() postProject(state) } const handleChange = (e) => { setstate({...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
) } export default withRouter(ProjectForm)
